name: Oya

lifestyle.sleep_pattern: Severely disrupted due to night pain, averaging 4-5 hours
lifestyle.stress_level: Moderate to High due to pain and work interference

chief_complaint.description: Severe right scapular/shoulder/arm pain extending to the wrist
chief_complaint.onset: Gradual onset over past few weeks

symptoms.pain_location: Right scapular region, shoulder, arm, extending to wrist
symptoms.pain_type: Deep constant ache with shooting pain and numb/heavy sensation
accompanying_symptoms: Numbness and heaviness in right arm
Pins and needles sensation in fingers

functional_limitations.work: Significant difficulty with computer work and desk tasks
functional_limitations.daily_tasks: Struggle with dressing, washing hair, reaching overhead, cooking
functional_limitations.hobbies: Unable to garden or take regular walks

medical_history.family_history: Mother with osteoarthritis, father with hypertension

social_history.living_situation: Lives with partner and two grown-up children
social_history.alcohol_consumption: Occasional, 1-2 glasses of wine per week

observation.appearance: Distressed, protective of right upper limb
observation.posture: Marked kyphotic upper thoracic spine, forward head posture

range_of_motion.active: Limited cervical flexion and extension, reduced shoulder mobility
range_of_motion.passive: Pain and resistance at end range of cervical movement

palpation.pain_points: Tender over cervical spine, paravertebral muscles, and right upper trapezius
palpation.tissue_quality: Increased muscle tone in upper trapezius and levator scapulae

xray.notes: To assess cervical spine and rule out bony pathology

mri.notes: To evaluate suspected nerve root compression

nerve_conduction.notes: To assess severity of neural involvement

key_findings: Severe night pain suggesting possible nerve root irritation
Clear neural symptoms with radicular pattern
Significant functional impact on daily activities

confirmed_diagnosis: Primary: Cervical radiculopathy with neural component
Secondary: Unlikely frozen shoulder or rotator cuff pathology

suggested_lines_of_inquiry: Assess sleep position and pillow support
Screen for red flags given severity
Assess impact on mental health and daily function
useful_notes: Urgent imaging needed given severity of symptoms
Consider psychological impact of severe pain
Strong family support system can be leveraged for recovery
